Sentencas: Dual functions of BaCe0.8Y0.2O3-alpha (BCY) as an electrolyte and as an anode were improved for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) applications.
Titulo: Surface modification of a doped BaCeO3 to function as an electrolyte and as an anode for SOFCs

Sentencas: A porous Ce-rich phase with fluorite structure was formed with a depth of similar to 10 mm from the BCY surface by vaporization of BaO from the BCY surface at 1700 degrees C.
Titulo: Surface modification of a doped BaCeO3 to function as an electrolyte and as an anode for SOFCs

Sentencas: The resulting BCY surface showed enough electronic conductivity to provide electrical collection and a high electrocatalytic activity for hydrogen oxidation.
Titulo: Surface modification of a doped BaCeO3 to function as an electrolyte and as an anode for SOFCs

Sentencas: A hydrogen-air fuel cell with the BCY electrolyte exhibited reasonable performances without using an anode material between 750 and 950 degrees C. (c) 2005 The Electrochemical Society.
Titulo: Surface modification of a doped BaCeO3 to function as an electrolyte and as an anode for SOFCs
